participant_abstract.sent: We demonstrated our prototype and discussed what could be sarcificed to bring the project within budget.
We went though a marketing survey and concluded that our design was fairly good.

participant_actions.sent: Umm, that was the last meeting.
Time to hand the whole thing over to another department

participant_decisions.sent: Lose the USB and go for a single curve - thought it may be possible to keep the articulation.
